thread.section_title: The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely stay
thread.title_full: Lovely stay - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David G
title: Lovely stay
text: This is charming boutique hotel conveniently located near paddington station. The staff are most helpful and friendly. The room was lovely (we declined an upgrade at an additional cost) and honestly thought the room we had was big enough with a lovely comfortable bed. I particularly liked the fresh biscuits that were placed in our room each day, it was just another lovely touch. Would certainly stay again when we travel to london again.
